description: Spider silk, woven tight around a body around the size of a desk, or a person. This one is slightly and disconcertingly squishy to the touch, but still retains most of its form factor.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cocooned prey is still dissolving. You guess a meal this size will take around six hours.
use_action.msg: You find this cocoon has finished digesting, and is now ready for consumption.

description: Spider silk, woven tightly around a body of the size and shape of a human being. This one is slightly and disconcertingly squishy to the touch, but still retains most of its form factor.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cocooned prey is still dissolving. You guess a meal this size will take around six hours.
use_action.msg: You find this cocoon has finished digesting, and is now ready for consumption.

description: Spider silk, woven tightly around a small body the size of a football. This one is slightly and disconcertingly squishy to the touch, but still retains most of its form factor.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cocooned prey is still dissolving. You guess a meal this size will take around six minutes.
use_action.msg: You find this cocoon has finished digesting, and is now ready for consumption.

description: A small, sealed, watertight wrapping of spider silk around a body the size of a large dog, or a child. This one is slightly and disconcertingly squishy to the touch, but still retains most of its form factor.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cocooned prey is still dissolving. You guess a meal this size will take around two hours.
use_action.msg: You find this cocoon has finished digesting, and is now ready for consumption.

description: A large cocoon of spidersilk, around a body roughly the size of a bear. This one is slightly and disconcertingly squishy to the touch, but still retains most of its form factor.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cocooned prey is still dissolving. You guess a meal this size will take around twenty hours.
use_action.msg: You find this cocoon has finished digesting, and is now ready for consumption.

description: A huge watertight cocoon of spidersilk. This one is slightly and disconcertingly squishy to the touch, but still retains most of its form factor.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The cocooned prey is still dissolving. You guess a meal this size will take close to two days!
use_action.msg: You find this cocoon has finished digesting, and is now ready for consumption.
